items.title: hololive English Official Pop-Up Store “Chronicles of hololive EN: THE NEXUS GATE -ActⅠ: The Portal Awakens-” To Be Held in New Jersey, USA!
items.author: narita
items.content:
September 12, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced the first of the official hololive English pop up store series, “Chronicles of hololive EN: THE NEXUS GATE -ActⅠ: The Portal Awakens-” coming to American Dream Shopping Mall in New Jersey, USA. Doors will open starting October 6th, and will run until November 2nd, 2025.

This pop-up store will feature in-store displays, mystery-solving events, merchandise sales, and meet-and-greet events starring hololive English talents, all of which will center around its “THE NEXUS GATE -ActⅠ: The Portal Awakens-” theme.

Details and additional information regarding this pop up store will be announced at a later date via the official hololive English X account, so please follow us there for the latest updates!

hololive English Official Pop-Up Store “Chronicles of hololive EN: THE NEXUS GATE -ActⅠ: The Portal Awakens-”

October 6th to November 2nd, 2025 (EDT)*Store hours will be announced at a later date.

items.title: hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future: The First-Ever Offline Concert Hits the Stage November 15!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
August 17, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) announces the first-ever concert featuring all hololive Indonesia talents, themed around a “colorful future,” aptly titled hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future, to be held on Saturday, November 15, 2025, in Indonesia. This event will serve as the main highlight of hololive Indonesia’s 5th anniversary celebrations, which have been ongoing since April this year.

For the first time, all nine hololive Indonesia talents from three generations; Ayunda Risu, Moona Hoshinova, Airani Iofifteen, Kureiji Ollie, Anya Melfissa, Pavolia Reine, Vestia Zeta, Kaela Kovalskia, and Kobo Kanaeru will share the stage in an offline music concert held at Indonesia’s event for creators, Comic Frontier 21, located at ICE BSD Hall 6, South Tangerang.

”I’m thrilled that the hololive Indonesia concert is finally becoming a reality. We’re working hard to make sure our fans in Indonesia will enjoy it, so please look forward to it!” commented Motoaki Tanigo, CEO, COVER Corporation.

The concert will utilize Unreal Engine technology for the first time in a hololive Indonesia performance, offering fans a uniquely enhanced concert experience. This historic event is proudly sponsored by Pocky and KARAOKE MANEKINEKO.

For the latest updates on the event, ticketing information, and merchandise, visit the official hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future website and follow the official hololive Indonesia social media channels. More exciting announcements are on the way, so don’t miss out!

hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future: Overview

hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future Organized by: COVER Corporation / hololive production

#holoIDChromaticFuture

November 15, 2025, 19:00 (WIB)

COMIC FRONTIER 21 Jl. BSD Grand Boulevard No.1, Pagedangan, Kec. Pagedangan, Kabupaten Tangerang, Banten 15339, Indonesia

Ayunda Risu / Moona Hoshinova / Airani Iofifteen / Kureiji Ollie / Anya Melfissa / Pavolia Reine / Vestia Zeta / Kaela Kovalskia / Kobo Kanaeru

items.title: Ninomae Ina’nis and SUSHIRO HONG KONG Team Up for the First-Ever hololive English Collaboration Starting August 13!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
August 13, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive English -Myth- talent Ninomae Ina’nis will be teaming up with SUSHIRO HONG KONG for the first-ever hololive English collaboration. A series of themed stores, limited-time collaboration menu items, and exclusive merchandise will start on Wednesday, August 13th, 2025 and end on Sunday, September 14, 2025.

Ninomae Ina’nis was at SOGO Causeway Bay! Earlier this month, Ninomae Ina’nis made a surprise appearance on SOGO Causeway Bay’s LED TV Screen, creating buzz among local fans and officially kicking off this highly anticipated collaboration.

SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis collaboration starts from August 13th! Ninomae Ina’nis will be taking over SUSHIRO HONG KONG with a special themed collaboration from August 13th until September 14, 2025.

During the promotion period, all SUSHIRO HONG KONG locations will offer three collaboration menu items and a special takeaway sushi set, each accompanied by limited-edition merchandise. In addition, customers who dine-in or use takeaway self-pickup services and spend a designated amount will be eligible to purchase exclusive collaboration goods — a must-have for any fan!

WAH! Three Themed Stores Pop Up Across Hong Kong – Calling All Fans to Show Up and Snap Away!

Starting August 13, three exclusive themed stores will open in Mong Kok, Causeway Bay Plaza 2, and Yuen Long Plaza. The special collaboration introduces two exclusive key visuals of Ninomae Ina’nis under the concept of “Day and Night”: By day, she takes on the cheerful role of a SUSHIRO staff member, and by night, she returns to her mystical roots as the Ancient Priestess.

Each store is fully themed with large photo walls, life-size standees, and custom table decorations—creating the perfect space for fans to snap photos, show their support, and enjoy exclusive collaboration menu items available only for a limited time.

Date: August 13 – September 14, 2025

・ SUSHIRO Mong Kok Address: B/F, King Wah Centre, 628 Nathan Road, Mong Kok, Kowloon

・ SUSHIRO Causeway Bay Plaza 2 Address: Shop 3A, 3/F, Causeway Bay Plaza 2, 463–483 Lockhart Road, Causeway Bay

・ SUSHIRO Yuen Long Plaza Address: Shops 341–348, 3/F, Yuen Long Plaza, 249–251 Castle Peak Road, Yuen Long, New Territories

SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Exclusive Collaboration Merchandise Details

This summer, SUSHIRO HONG KONG and Ninomae Ina’nis bring fans a flavorful trio of themed dishes. Each dine-in order of a collaboration item comes with one piece of exclusive merchandise — a double dose of surprise and delight! Items feature chibi Ina’nis in original designs created just for this event, paired with SUSHIRO’s most popular menu icons and mascots!

[SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Food Pick with Purchase]

Event Period: August 13 – September 14, 2025, while supplies last. Event Rules: Customers who dine-in at any SUSHIRO location in Hong Kong and order “Ina’nis’ Favorite! Seared Mentaiko Trio (HK$22)”, will receive one randomly selected per eligible order.

・ SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis food pick*6 designs in total, randomly distributed; limited to one per transaction.

[SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Acrylic Mini Standee with Purchase]

Event Period: August 13 – September 14, 2025, while supplies last. Event Rules: Customers who dine-in at any SUSHIRO location in Hong Kong and order “Takodachi Energy Boost: Fried Octopus Bites (HK$36)”, will receive one randomly selected per eligible order.

・ SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis acrylic mini standee*6 designs in total, randomly distributed; limited to one per transaction.

[SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Acrylic Transparent Card Keychain with Purchase]

Event Period: August 13 – September 14, 2025, while supplies last. Event Rules: Customers who dine-in at any SUSHIRO location in Hong Kong and order “WAH! Eldritch Trial: Red Grape Parfait (HK$38)”, will receive one randomly selected acrylic transparent card keychain per eligible order.

・ SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis acrylic transparent card keychain*6 designs in total, randomly distributed; limited to one per transaction.

SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Exclusive Takeaway Merchandise

In addition to the dine-in exclusive items, Sushiro has specially launched the “Ina’nis Collab Takeaway Sushi Set”, a convenient option for busy Hong Kongers on the go.

[SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Takeaway Sushi Set – Exclusive Merchandise Promotion]

Event Period: August 13 – September 14, 2025, while supplies last. Event Rules: Customers who purchase the “Ina’nis Collab Takeaway Sushi Set” (HK$99) at any SUSHIRO HONG KONG location will receive one SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Eco-Bag per set purchased.

・ SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Eco-Bag*1 design in total; limited to one per transaction.

The eco-bag features both day and night versions of Ina’nis on the front, elegant collaboration branding on the back, and an attached Takodachi-shaped pouch for convenient storage.

SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Add-On Merchandise Promotion

SUSHIRO HONG KONG is launching four exclusive collaboration merchandise items for local fans. During the promotion period, customers who dine in or use takeaway self-pickup and spend a net amount of HK$200* or more in a single transaction will be eligible to purchase select items at a special add-on price*. Each item is available while supplies last and offers the perfect way to commemorate this limited-time collaboration!*Net amount refers to the final payment after deducting discounts, coupons, or promotions and includes the 10% service charge. *Not applicable to orders via third-party delivery platforms.

[SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Add-On Merchandise – Phase 1]

Event Period: Starting from August 13, 2025, while supplies last. Event Rules: Spend HK$200 or more at any SUSHIRO HONG KONG location, dine-in or takeaway self-pickup only, to become eligible to purchase the following items:

・ SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Acrylic Carabiner Keychain – HK$49*2 designs in total, randomly distributed; limited to one per transaction.

・ SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Cooling Fan – HK$169*2 designs in total, randomly distributed; limited to one per transaction.

[SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Add-On Merchandise – Phase 2]

Event Period: Starting from August 27, 2025, while supplies last. Event Rules: Spend HK$200 or more at any SUSHIRO HONG KONG location, dine-in or takeaway self-pickup only, to become eligible to purchase the following items:

・ SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Magnetic Plush Charms – HK$219*1 set includes 2 designs

・ SUSHIRO HONG KONG x Ninomae Ina’nis Acrylic Standee – HK$149*2 designs in total, customers may choose a design.

For information regarding the event, please visit SUSHIRO HONG KONG’s official social media channels:

Founded in 1984, Sushiro has grown to become Japan’s No.1 conveyor belt sushi brand. As of the end of March 2024, the brand operates 797 locations across Japan and overseas (including takeaway-only stores). In Hong Kong, there are currently 35 branches, each offering over 100 types of sushi and Japanese dishes at any given time. As a leader in Japan’s conveyor belt sushi market, Sushiro is committed to a customer-first philosophy — carefully selecting ingredients, continuously developing new flavors, and leveraging cutting-edge technology to enhance service quality. The brand strives to deliver high-quality and great-value Japanese cuisine to all customers.

items.title: RHINOSHIELD Launches Exclusive Collaboration with hololive production — Limited-Time VTuber Phone Accessories Now Available for Preorder
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
Global mobile accessories brand today announced the launch of its biggest summer collaboration yet — the “VTuber Summer Fest 2025” — in partnership with four popular talents from , offering fans a series of officially licensed phone cases, lifestyle accessories, and exclusive gifts. Available for a limited time from , the collection will be sold across Taiwan, Japan, Europe, North America, and other key markets.

An Officially Licensed Dream Collaboration with Four hololive production talents

The “VTuber Summer Fest” brings together a cross-generation lineup of hololive talents. Returning collaborator is joined by first-time partners , , and . Together, they star in over 12 limited-edition summer-themed designs inspired by swimwear, yukata, and mascot motifs.

Products include RHINOSHIELD’s signature Impact-Resistant Phone Cases and the fan-favorite AquaStand MagSafe Water Bottles.

Impact-Resistant Phone Cases ・ Designs： 4 designs per talent

・ Supported Models： AirX, SolidX, SolidSuit, Clear, JellyTint, Mod NX

・ Compatible with a wide range of iPhone and Android models

・ Variants： Standard / MagSafe Compatible

・ Price： From (Standard) / (MagSafe)

AquaStand MagSafe Water Bottles ・ Designs： 3 designs per talent

・ Bottle Types： Stainless Steel (L) 700ml / Tritan (L) 800ml / Stainless Steel (M) 480ml

・ Price： From

Limited-Time Preorder Bonus Periods

Shishiro Botan： July 25, 06:00 AM – August 27, 10:00 AM (EDT) Momosuzu Nene： August 1, 05:00 AM – August 27, 10:00 PM (EDT)

Mori Calliope & Ninomae Ina’nis： August 8, 00:00 AM – August 27, 10:00 PM (EDT)

All items are available for preorder only. Shipping times may vary by product and will follow the order in which purchases are made.

Exclusive Tiered Preorder Gifts

Spend on a single talent’s collection before , and receive (3 designs total, randomly shipped, no selection allowed).

Spend on a single talent’s collection before , and receive the full set of 3 acrylic stands, plus an and limited-edition collectible card.* The tote bag and card are limited-quantity bonuses available while supplies last. Acrylic stands are time-limited bonuses and will be granted to qualifying purchases made before 5:00 AM (EDT) on August 27, 2025. * Purchases for each talent are counted separately. Spending across different talent lines cannot be combined. In case of returns, all gifts must also be returned.

Orders over qualify for free shipping.Discount codes cannot be applied to orders containing talent collaboration items.Purchase both a phone case and an AquaStand bottle from the talent collection to enjoy up to 30% off the bottle.

items.title: hololive production and RHINOSHIELD are expanding their collaboration with the new “holonatsu Paradise” collection, starting August 8!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
August 8, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive production will be expanding its collaboration with RHINOSHIELD to include eight additional talents. The “holonatsu Paradise” collection will feature seasonal designs and limited-time gifts. Sales will begin on August 8th and run until August 27th, 2025.

Quantities are limited — be sure to order early to support your oshi in style!

RHINOSHIELD x hololive production “holonatsu Paradise” collection is here!

The new summer collection features eight talents from hololive Gen 0 and hololive English -Promise-, bringing a burst of energy to the summer season. The collaboration introduces all-new, officially licensed summer-themed phone accessory designs — each one crafted to celebrate the unique charm of every talent. To supercharge your summer, fans can unlock special preorder perks available for a limited time only. Whether you’re cheering for your oshi or collecting them all, this is the ultimate summer drop no hololive fan should miss.

hololive Gen 0 and hololive English -Promise- Assemble for an Unforgettable Summer!

The RHINOSHIELD x hololive production “holonatsu Paradise” collection features eight talents: ・ hololive Gen 0: Tokino Sora, Robocosan, AZKi, Sakura Miko, Hoshimachi Suisei

・ hololive English -Promise-: IRyS, Ouro Kronii, Hakos Baelz

Each talent will appear in exclusive summer-inspired designs across multiple RHINOSHIELD product categories, including impact-resistant phone cases, AquaStand MagSafe water bottles, AirPods cases, and GRIP O phone grips. Every design blends character details with seasonal flair, delivering accessories that are stylish, collectible, and functional — all officially licensed and compatible with a wide range of iPhone and Android devices, including MagSafe.

“holonatsu Paradise” collection Lineup

Impact-Resistant Phone Cases ・ 2 designs per talent

・ Supported Models: AirX, SolidX, SolidSuit, Clear, JellyTint, Mod NX

・ iPhone and Android compatible (full list on website)

・ Variants: Standard / MagSafe Compatible

・ Price: From $39.99 (Standard) / $52.99 (MagSafe)

AquaStand MagSafe Water Bottles ・ 1 design per talent

・ Bottle Types: Stainless Steel (L) 700ml / Tritan (L) 800ml / Stainless Steel (M) 480ml

・ Price: From $49.99

・ 1 design per talent

・ 1 design per talent

Exclusive Tiered Preorder Bonus Gift

Event Period: August 8th to August 27th, 2025, 5:00 AM (EDT)

Event Rules: Spend $60 on any single talent’s collection before the deadline to receive a limited-edition screen cleaning cloth featuring that talent.

Bonus Gift: One RHINOSHIELD x hololive production screen cleaning cloth.*1 design per talent; limited to one cloth per qualifying transaction.

Event Period: August 8th to August 27th, 2025, 5:00 AM (EDT)

Event Rules: Spend $119 on any single talent’s collection before the deadline to receive both the screen cleaning cloth and an exclusive frameless collectible art print.

Bonus Gift: One RHINOSHIELD x hololive production screen cleaning cloth and one RHINOSHIELD x hololive production frameless collectible art print.*1 design per talent for each item; limited to one bonus set per qualifying transaction.

[Bonus Terms & Conditions]

Bonus items are available while supplies last. Purchases for each talent are tracked separately — totals cannot be combined across different talents.

If a qualifying order is returned, all bonus items must also be returned.

Purchase Bonus Campaign & Bundle Discounts Details

Campaign Period: August 8th to August 27th, 2025, 5:00 AM (EDT) Free Shipping: Available for orders over $50

Discount Codes: Not applicable to orders containing talent collaboration items

Buy one talent’s phone case + AquaStand to receive up to 30% off the AquaStand

Buy one talent’s phone case + GRIP O to receive 5% off the GRIP O

items.title: AZKi × Maaya Uchida Collaborative Song “Sekai no Iro” Released Digitally on Thursday, August 7!
items.author: narita
items.content:
COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) has announced the digital release of “Sekai no Iro,” the theme song for the animated promotional video of the virtual world project Holoearth, which became available at midnight (JST) on Thursday, August 7, 2025.

■ HOLOEARTH animated PV “Now, discover your other world.”

This promotional video, produced by WIT STUDIO, embodies the concept for the world that Holoearth aspires to create. The featured theme song, titled “Sekai no Iro” (Colors of the World), is performed in collaboration between AZKi and Maaya Uchida.

In addition to the rich harmony woven by these two artists, this release also includes solo versions for a 4-track collection.

Title： Sekai no Iro

Artists： AZKi, Maaya Uchida

Lyrics： Haruka Kato

Composition： Haruka Kato, Nozomi Tanabe

Arrangement： Nozomi Tanabe

■ Track list 1.Sekai no Iro

2.Sekai no Iro (AZKi solo ver.)

3.Sekai no Iro (Maaya Uchida solo ver.)

4.Sekai no Iro (Instrumental)

■ Sales format Digital distribution

■ Date of availability August 7, 2025 (Thu)

items.title: hololive production Returns to Anime NYC 2025!
items.author: narita
items.content:
Tokyo, JAPAN — COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan, CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) announced today that hololive production will be at Anime NYC 2025 from August 21st – 24th at Javits Convention Center in New York City.

hololive production booth at Anime NYC 2025 Overview

August 21st- 24th, 2025

Javits Convention Center

445 11th Ave, New York, NY 10001

hololive production booth Streaming Activities hololive productions talents are back at Anime NYC! Visit our booth (#1710) and enjoy convention-exclusive live interactions together with our talents from hololive, hololive Indonesia, hololive English, hololive DEV_IS, and HOLOSTARS English. The list of participating talents will be announced through social media at a later time.

Guests at Anime NYC will get the chance to sing in front of their oshis!

As a feature program for the booth streaming activities, convention guests may perform hololive production songs to a judging panel of three discerning talents, who will give them a score based on whatever wild, fun metrics they may decide.

hololive production Stamp Rally Stamp cards will be distributed at the booth, and attendees can collect stamps by visiting the booths of our hololive Meet partner companies. Depending on the amount of stamps collected, participants who collect stamps on their card may be eligible to receive prizes!

Special Gifts and Freebies ・ Memorial Stamp

・ hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME English Edition Exclusive PR Card with hololive STAGE World Tour ‘25 -Synchronize!- Key Visual

・ hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME Catalog

Our time schedule and other booth program details will be announced at a later date. Please check our official X account for the latest information!https://x.com/hololive_En

Come see, experience, and enjoy hololive production talents at the hololive production booth at Anime NYC 2025!
